summary: RPA Designer tipo_design feature testing complete. All 10 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verification successful - Login and Extração buttons are present with correct counters showing 0 login designs and 4 extracao designs for Uber Fleet platform.

issues: Console warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' - minor React key issue in some component (c693c9ec-ddd5-400c-b79d-61b651e7b3fd)

critical_code_review_comments: Minor React key warning in dashboard component - not related to RPA Designer feature but should be investigated
seed_data_creation: None - used existing Uber Fleet platform (ID: ba0f947c-b7d5-4127-8383-817b13ec406d)
context_for_next_testing_agent: RPA Designer tipo_design feature fully implemented and tested. Backend endpoints support tipo_design parameter for filtering (GET /api/rpa-designer/designs?tipo_design=login or extracao), session creation (POST /api/rpa-designer/sessao/iniciar accepts tipo_design), and saving (POST /api/rpa-designer/sessao/{id}/guardar saves correct tipo_design). Frontend shows 'Tipo de Design' section with Login and Extração buttons showing counters. Uber Fleet platform has 4 extracao designs (semanas 0-3) and 0 login designs currently.

endpoints_tested.GET /api/rpa-designer/designs: 200 OK - Returns designs with tipo_design field (default: 'extracao' for legacy designs)
endpoints_tested.GET /api/rpa-designer/designs?tipo_desig: 200 OK - Filters correctly, returns only login designs
200 OK - Filters correctly, returns extracao designs
endpoints_tested.POST /api/rpa-designer/sessao/iniciar: 200 OK - Accepts tipo_design parameter (login/extracao), defaults to 'extracao'
endpoints_tested.GET /api/rpa-designer/designs-sincroniza: 200 OK - Returns separate login and extracao design info with pode_executar flag and fluxo description

ui_elements_verified.Login button: ✓ Present with '0 gravados' counter and Key icon
ui_elements_verified.Extração button: ✓ Present with '4 gravados' counter and Download icon
ui_elements_verified.Week button status icons: ✓ CheckCircle (green) for weeks with designs, AlertCircle (orange) for weeks without
ui_elements_verified.Dynamic help text: ✓ Changes based on selected tipo_design ('Grave os passos para fazer login na plataforma' vs 'Grave os passos para extrair dados semanais')
